com.github.tix_measurements.time.core.util

Class TixTimeUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.tix_measurements.time.core.util.TixTimeUtils

  • public class TixTimeUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that contains all the utilities functions and methods that are used across all the tix-time-core lib project.

    • Method Detail

      • sign

        public static byte[] sign(java.lang.String message,
                          java.security.KeyPair keyPair)
        Signs a message String with a "SHA1WithRSA" algorithm of Signature using the specified KeyPair
        Parameters:
        message - String representing the message to sign
        keyPair - KeyPair with which to sign the message
        Returns:
        byte[] representing the SHA-1 with RSA signature of the message

      • verify

        public static boolean verify(java.lang.String message,
                             byte[] encodedPublicKey,
                             byte[] signature)
        Verifies a message String with the supplied bytes of the PublicKey encoded using Key.getEncoded() and the signature. The key must be made with the algorithm "RSA" and the signature with "SHA1WithRSA".
        Parameters:
        message - String representing the message to verify
        encodedPublicKey - byte[] resulting of using Key.getEncoded() in an "RSA" public key.
        signature - byte[] representing the signature made with "SHA1WithRSA"
        Returns:
        true if the signatures verifies the message with the provided public key, false otherwise.
